verses.verse: And when He had <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from the <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G3015>leper<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him, and <S%G4352>bowed<s%> <S%G4352>down<s%> to Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> You are <S%G2309>willing,<s%> You <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2511>make<s%> me <S%G2511>clean.<s%>"

And He <S%G1614>stretched<s%> out His <S%G5495>hand<s%> and <S%G681>touched<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I <S%G2309>am<s%> <S%G2309>willing;<s%> be <S%G2511>cleansed.<s%>" And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> his <S%G3014>leprosy<s%> was <S%G2511>cleansed.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3708>"See<s%> that you <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one;<s%> but <S%G5217>go,<s%> <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> to the <S%G2409>priest,<s%> and <S%G4374>present<s%> the <S%G1435>offering<s%> that <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G4367>commanded,<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> to them."
And when He had <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G2746>Capernaum,<s%> a <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him, <S%G3870>entreating<s%> Him,
and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> my <S%G3816>servant<s%> is <S%G906>lying<s%> <S%G3885>paralyzed<s%> at <S%G3614>home,<s%> <S%G928>suffering<s%> <S%G1171>great<s%> <S%G928>pain.<s%>"
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "I will <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2323>heal<s%> him."

But the <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G2425>worthy<s%> for You to <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> my <S%G4721>roof,<s%> but <S%G3441>just<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and my <S%G3816>servant<s%> will be <S%G2390>healed.<s%>

"For I, <S%G2532>too,<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> with <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> me; and I <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>one,<s%> <S%G4198>'Go!<s%>' and he <S%G4198>goes,<s%> and to <S%G243>another,<s%> <S%G2064>'Come!<s%>' and he <S%G2064>comes,<s%> and to my <S%G1401>slave,<s%> <S%G4160>'Do<s%> <S%G3778>this!<s%>' and he <S%G4160>does<s%> [it]."

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> [this,] He <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G190>following,<s%> <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I have not <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5118>such<s%> <S%G5118>great<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> with <S%G3762>anyone<s%> in <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

" And I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> from <S%G395>east<s%> and <S%G1424>west,<s%> and <S%G347>recline<s%> [at the table] with <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven;<s%>

but the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%G1544>cast<s%> out into the <S%G1857>outer<s%> <S%G4655>darkness;<s%> in that <S%G1563>place<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall be <S%G2805>weeping<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth.<s%> "

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G1543>centurion,<s%> <S%G5217>"Go<s%> your <S%G5217>way;<s%> let it be <S%G1096>done<s%> to you as you have <S%G4100>believed.<s%>" And the <S%G3816>servant<s%> was <S%G2390>healed<s%> that [very] <S%G5610>hour.<s%>
And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2064>come<s%> to Peter's <S%G3614>home,<s%> He <S%G3708>saw<s%> his mother-in-law <S%G906>lying<s%> <S%G906>sick<s%> in bed with a <S%G4445>fever.<s%>
And He <S%G681>touched<s%> her <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and the <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> her; and she <S%G1453>arose,<s%> and <S%G1247>waited<s%> on Him.

And when <S%G3798>evening<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to Him <S%G4183>many<s%> who were demon-possessed; and He <S%G1544>cast<s%> out the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> with a <S%G3056>word,<s%> and <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> who were <S%G2192>ill<s%> <S%G2560><s%>

in <S%G3704>order<s%> that <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> our <S%G769>infirmities,<s%> and <S%G941>carried<s%> <S%G941>away<s%> our <S%G3554>diseases.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G3793>crowd<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> Him, He <S%G2753>gave<s%> <S%G2753>orders<s%> to <S%G565>depart<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side.<s%>

And a <S%G1520>certain<s%> <S%G1122>scribe<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> I will <S%G190>follow<s%> You <S%G3699>wherever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> You <S%G565>go.<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "The <S%G258>foxes<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5454>holes,<s%> and the <S%G4071>birds<s%> of the <S%G3772>air<s%> [have] <S%G2682>nests;<s%> but the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3756>nowhere<s%> <S%G4226><s%> to <S%G2827>lay<s%> His <S%G2776>head.<s%>"

And <S%G2087>another<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G2010>permit<s%> me <S%G4413>first<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> and <S%G2290>bury<s%> my <S%G3962>father.<s%>"
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G190>"Follow<s%> Me; and <S%G863>allow<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> to <S%G2290>bury<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G3498>dead.<s%>"
And when He <S%G1684>got<s%> into the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>storm<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G4143>boat<s%> was <S%G2572>covered<s%> with the <S%G2949>waves;<s%> but He <S%G846>Himself<s%> was <S%G2518>asleep.<s%>
And they <S%G4334>came<s%> to [Him,] and <S%G1453>awoke<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4982>"Save<s%> [us,] <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> we are <S%G622>perishing!<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are you <S%G1169>timid,<s%> you <S%G3640>men<s%> of <S%G3640>little<s%> <S%G3640>faith<s%>?" <S%G5119>Then<s%> He <S%G1453>arose,<s%> and <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G417>winds<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> and it <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G3173>perfectly<s%> <S%G1055>calm.<s%>

And the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4217>"What<s%> <S%G4217>kind<s%> of a <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G3778>this,<s%> that <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G417>winds<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> Him?"

And when He had <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> into the <S%G5561>country<s%> of the <S%G1046>Gadarenes,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> men who were demon-possessed <S%G5221>met<s%> Him as they were <S%G1831>coming<s%> out of the <S%G3419>tombs;<s%> [they were] so <S%G3029>exceedingly<s%> <S%G5467>violent<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G2480>could<s%> <S%G3928>pass<s%> by that <S%G3598>road.<s%>

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> they <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do we have to do with You, <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>? Have You <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> to <S%G928>torment<s%> us <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%>?"
<S%G1161>Now<s%> there was at a <S%G3112>distance<s%> from them a <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5519>swine<s%> <S%G1006>feeding.<s%>

And the <S%G1142>demons<s%> [began] to <S%G3870>entreat<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> You are [going to] <S%G1544>cast<s%> us out, <S%G649>send<s%> us into the <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5217>"Begone!<s%>" And they <S%G1831>came<s%> out, and <S%G565>went<s%> into the <S%G5519>swine,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G34>herd<s%> <S%G3729>rushed<s%> <S%G2596>down<s%> the <S%G2911>steep<s%> <S%G2911>bank<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and <S%G599>perished<s%> in the <S%G5204>waters.<s%>

And the <S%G1006>herdsmen<s%> <S%G5343>ran<s%> <S%G5343>away,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> to the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G518>reported<s%> <S%G3956>everything,<s%> <S%G2532>including<s%> the [incident] of the <S%G1139>demoniacs.<s%>

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out to <S%G5222>meet<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%> and when they <S%G3708>saw<s%> Him, they <S%G3870>entreated<s%> [Him] to <S%G3327>depart<s%> from their <S%G3725>region.<s%>
